citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15 am on 3/13/25.
The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone but he was not available for inspection. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15 am on 3/13/25. 
The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone but he was not available for inspection. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
